data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pinkert, Stefan, Bechly, Günter, Nel, André (2017): First record of hawker dragonflies from Eocene Baltic amber (Odonata: Anisoptera: Gomphaeschnidae). Zootaxa 4272 (2): 263-275, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4272.2.7|2 occurrences
